text: Yacouba Nambelesseny Bamba (born 30 November 1991) is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Kokand 1912. ==Family== His older brother Fousseni Bamba is also a footballer.Yacouba Bamba interview ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bingerville Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ivorian footballers Category:Ivorian expatriate footballers Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Uzbekistan Super League players Category:ASEC Mimosas players Category:AS Denguélé players Category:FC Slutsk players Category:FC Zaria Bălți players Category:FC Orenburg players Category:FC Saxan players Category:Expatriate footballers in Moldova Category:Expatriate footballers in Belarus Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia
title: Yacouba Nambelesseny Bamba
